translations: 吉普赛人的；吉普赛语的；吉普赛人之风俗习惯的

sentences.sentence: The Gypsies speak a language called Romany which has many common words with Indian languages.
sentences.translation: 吉普赛人说一种吉普赛语，与印度语言有很多共同的单词。

sentences.sentence: Last Hole on the Flute examines the life, work and traveling of Romany musicians in the far south of the Balkans.
sentences.translation: 长笛上的最后一个洞眼关注了吉普赛音乐家在遥远的南巴尔干地区的生活，工作和旅行。

sentences.sentence: Strangely in an age that prizes gender-neutral language, that is the literal plural of "Rom", a Romany word meaning man or husband.
sentences.translation: 让人觉得奇怪的是，在这个珍视中性语言的年代，“Roma”是“Rom”的复数形式，而“Rom”在吉普赛语中是男人或丈夫的意思。
